RelatedSentence: Participants of a policy dialogue on Monday expressed concern that although the Punjab Transparency and Right to Information Act 2013 was enacted in December last , public information officers had still not been appointed .

Information officers were to be appointed within 60 days of the enactment of the act , said Beaconhouse National University ( BNU ) assistant professor at the School of Media and Communication Wajahat Masood .
He was addressing an RTI Baithak organised by the BNU at the Lahore College for Women University .

Masood said basic decisions regarding recruitment of these officers had still not been made .
